name: Hydroponics Simulator
description:
The rapid urbanization of the Philippines resulted to the lack of farmlands that lessen the production of agricultural crops in the country. By being educated about the Hydroponic method of farming, the urban space that are available can be repurposed for Hydroponic farming that can be an alternative solution to sustain the agricultural needs of the country. 

This simulation was designed to be a learning material and source of information about building a Hydroponic system. The simulation provides step by step instructions on how to build an actual hydroponic system, Information Menu that contains all the important details about a set of suitable plants for hydroponics, and the materials to be used and the different types of Hydroponics method. 

MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENT

>Windows OS(64 bit)

>Intel i3 5th gen

>2gb VRAM

>4GB Memory

>400mb of Storage
